verses.name: Jeremiah 52:4
verses.text: And it came to pass in the ninth year of his reign, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came, he and all his army, against Jerusalem, and pitched against it, and built forts against it round about.

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:5
verses.text: So the city was besieged unto the eleventh year of king Zedekiah.

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:6
verses.text: And in the fourth month, in the ninth day of the month, the famine was sore in the city, so that there was no bread for the people of the land.
